1. A student whose attendance is less than 75% in all the courses put together in any semester will not be permitted to attend the end - semester examination and he / she will not be allowed to register for subsequent semesters of study. He / she has to repeat the semester along with his / her juniors.
2. However, the Vice Chancellor on the recommendation of the Principal / Director of the Institute / School may condone the shortage of attendance to the students whose attendance is between 66% and 74% on genuine medical grounds, on payment of prescribed fee.
If you are absent because of health reasons then submit your medical certificate to your respective AMC to consider for appearing in semester exams.
What to do if attendance is below 75%

formData.subtitle$en: Established in 1980 as a main-campus of GITAM. Nestled in between the valley of Eastern Ghats and Bay of Bengal, the location is the most idyllic places in Andhra Pradesh.

Established in 2012, with modern infrastructure supported by dedicated faculty and administrative staff. The campus is located in an ideal environment in Karnataka.[Visit to know more](https://www.gitam.edu/bengaluru)

Established in 2009 as an off-campus of GITAM. Since then the campus has grown into a well acclaimed hub of higher education in the state of Telangana.[visit to know more](https://www.gitam.edu/hyderabad)
